COMMON.name: Donations of Test Kits
COMMON.description: A neighboring country is donating test kits. They should be enough for a whole week of testing without any expenses.

COMMON.name: Test Kit Shortages
COMMON.description: Our ordered test-kits didn't arrive on time, to still keep up with testing, test kits will cost us double the amount for the next week.
COMMON.summary: price of test kits *2 for 7 days

COMMON.name: Medical personnel is volunteering
COMMON.description: Non-governmental organisations are sending trained force to support our health workers for a week.
COMMON.summary: salary for 10.000 health workers is sponsored for 7 days

COMMON.name: An anonymous donation was made to our cause
COMMON.description: An anonymous donation of 100.000 € was made to our cause.

COMMON.name: Bad news are dominating the media
COMMON.description: Lately, a lot of false news have been popping up. The population seems affected by this.

RARE.name: An anonymous donation was made to our cause.
RARE.description: An anonymous donation of 1 Mio. € was made to our cause.

RARE.name: State employees demand a bonus
RARE.description: Given the risks of their dangerous new working conditions, police and health workers demand a bonus.  For two weeks their salary increases by 10 € / day.
RARE.summary: salary of state employees +10 € for 14 day

RARE.name: Finally some true news
RARE.description: Lately, we have been seeing a lot more true news than usual. This eases unhappy minds.

RARE.name: People going out due to heat wave
RARE.description: Amid the hot weather, people are drawn to parks, lakes and the sea. Virologists are predicting a small surge in new infections.

VERY_RARE.name: Police are sending trainees to work
VERY_RARE.description: To support the strained force, police decided to put their trainees to work early. For us, this means more force for the same price.
VERY_RARE.summary: salary for 10.000 police officers is sponsored for 7 days

VERY_RARE.name: An anonymous donation was made to our cause.
VERY_RARE.description: An anonymous donation of 100.000.000 € was made to our cause.

VERY_RARE.name: People staying in due to storms
VERY_RARE.description: The false weather lately has people leave their houses less. Virologists are predicting a small dip in new infections.

EPIC.name: An anonymous donation was made to our cause.
EPIC.description: An anonymous donation of 1.000.000.000 € was made to our cause.

EPIC.name: State employees demand a bonus
EPIC.description: Given the risks of their dangerous new working conditions, police and health workers demand a bonus. For six weeks their salary increases by 5 € / day.
EPIC.summary: salary of state employees +5 € for 42 day

EPIC.name: Flu season
EPIC.description: As flu season is beginning, experts are anticipating higher-than-usual death rates as the diseases overlap.

LEGENDARY.name: Generous NGO supporting police and health workers
LEGENDARY.description: An NGO is supplying volunteers and 1 Mio. € in donations in a large-scale effort to help police and healthcare.
LEGENDARY.summary: +1 Mio. € | salary of state employees -5 €/day permanently | +5.000 police officers | +5.000 health workers

LEGENDARY.name: An anonymous donation was made to our cause.
LEGENDARY.description: An anonymous donation of 5.000.000.000 € was made to our cause. Sponsored by M.K. and S.F.

LEGENDARY.name: Some f*cking true news!
LEGENDARY.description: A neighbouring country has no more active cases. Your population gains hope that the pandemic can be stopped!
